disableSharing.title: Disable Sharing.
disableSharing.description: Disallow sharing on Youtube or Drive if set to true.

disableSaveToDisk.title: Disallow Save to Disk.
disableSaveToDisk.description: Disallow saving recordings to disk if set to true.

driveSync.title: Store Recordings on Google Drive.
driveSync.description: Always store recordings on Google Drive if set to true.

enableDiskSpaceWatcher.title: Pause on low Disk space.
enableDiskSpaceWatcher.description: Avoid using up all disk space. Disable this on shared ChromeOS devices to allow automatic space eviction to kick in.
